posts.content:
After a successful local get together last year, Jersey Air-cooled Club would like to
invite you to a weekend campout in Jersey.
This is not a show as such but a get together with like minded people, enjoying
what the island has to offer, there will be no food or trade stands.

We have secured an area at one of our local campsite, which has all the normal facilities.
Shop, restaurant, pool, Etc.
http://www.campingjersey.com/

Dates for the weekend Friday 3rd to Sunday 5th June, obviously if you wish to
arrive earlier or stay longer it wont be a problem. There is a lot to do on the island,
places to visit, and amazing beaches.

This weekend coincides with the Jersey International Festival of motoring.
We have an area at the show to display peopleâ€™s buses if they wish.
http://www.jimf.je

Ferries are from Poole on the new fast Catamaran or on the conventional ferry from Portsmouth.
http://www.condorferries.co.uk/

Hope to see you there
